thread.title: Stephanie Davis makes first public appearance since birth of baby Caben-Albi… as she plugs 3D lipo procedure at London beauty expo

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Stephanie Davis makes first public appearance since birth of baby Caben-Albi… as she plugs 3D lipo procedure at London beauty expo
text:
Steph looked incredible at the London expo WENN 7 Stephanie Davis’ autobiography is reportedly being altered to include her reunion with Jeremy McConnell 
A source told Daily Star Online : “ Jeremy and Steph are on great terms now so bosses at Ebury publishing want the book to reflect that. Splash News 7 Stephanie Davis and Jeremy were at odds during her pregnancy Jeremy McConnell PLEADS with ex Steph Davis to do the right thing by son if he’s the dad Twitter Stephanie and Jeremy's son Caben-Albi has brought them back together 
"They are still going ahead with the release but the last chapter has been rewritten." 
They added that it should be finished within the next couple of weeks. 
One onlooker told us: "Steph was overheard telling a hotel receptionist that baby Caben-Albi was at home with his Nan and Grandad. RELATED STORIES Ex on the Reese Steph Davis' ex Sam Reese in talks' for Ex on the Beach... but will the CBB star make an appearance? No Loyalty Sam Reece appears to take a dig at his ex-girlfriend Steph Davis ‘getting back with’ baby-daddy Jeremy McConnell INSTA LOVE Jeremy McConnell likes Stephanie Davis' lingerie photo just hours after they spark reconciliation rumours LOOKING COSY Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis look happier than ever as they're spotted in Liverpool hotel SHORT HAIR DON'T CARE Stephanie Davis has revealed a dramatic new look and chopped her long hair into a chic bob DADDY'S HOME Jeremy McConnell sets up home in Liverpool with Stephanie Davis and newborn Caben-Albi 'I LOVE THEM BOTH!' Jonathan Cheban praises Steph Davis and hopes son brings her and Jeremy McConnell back together 
“Jez was really attentive towards Steph as they sat in the hotel’s foyer and PIMA bar. 
“They were oblivious to people around them – they were deep in conversation and also laughing and joking quite a lot. 
"Jez also had his hand on Steph's leg for a brief few seconds but he quickly removed it as soon as a group of hotel guests sat on the seats next to them." Phillip Schofield tells Jeremy McConnell not to sign paternity document issued by ex Stephanie Davis
